title: BRIEF-Koppers Enters Into Second Amendment And Joinder To Credit Agreement Dated February 17, 2017
text:
April 13, 2018 / 6:26 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Koppers Enters Into Second Amendment And Joinder To Credit Agreement Dated February 17, 2017 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 13 (Reuters) - Koppers Holdings Inc: 
* SAYS ON APRIL 10, UNIT ENTERED INTO SECOND AMENDMENT AND JOINDER TO CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED FEBRUARY 17, 2017 
* SAYS AGREEMENT AMENDED TO ADD TERM LOAN COMPONENT IN AMOUNT OF $100 MILLION WITH 10% ANNUAL AMORTIZATION AND A MANDATORY PREPAYMENT PROVISION Source text : ( bit.ly/2HyQajZ ) Further company coverage:
